trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of character glyphs from distinct physical typefaces.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma coleção de glifos de caractere de tipos faces de tipo distintas.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextCharacters" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextCharacters" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the text characters.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.String" /> que contém os caracteres de texto.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties" /> value to use for the characters in <c>characterString</c>.
trans-unit.target: O valor <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties" /> a ser usado para os caracteres em <c>characterString</c>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextCharacters" /> class using a specified character string.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextCharacters" /> usando uma cadeia de caracteres especificada.

trans-unit.source: Pointer to character string.
trans-unit.target: Ponteiro para cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: The length of the characters to use in <c>unsafeCharacterString</c>.
trans-unit.target: O comprimento dos caracteres a serem usados em <c>unsafeCharacterString</c>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties" /> value to use for the characters in <c>unsafeCharacterString</c>.
trans-unit.target: O valor <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties" /> a ser usado para os caracteres em <c>unsafeCharacterString</c>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextCharacters" /> class using a specified unsafe character string.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextCharacters" /> usando uma cadeia de caracteres desprotegidos especificada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Char" /> array.
trans-unit.target: A matriz <see cref="T:System.Char" />.

trans-unit.source: The offset to the first character to use in <c>characterArray</c>.
trans-unit.target: O deslocamento para o primeiro caractere a ser usado em <c>characterArray</c>.

trans-unit.source: The length of the characters to use in <c>characterArray</c>.
trans-unit.target: O comprimento dos caracteres a serem usados em <c>characterArray</c>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties" /> value to use for the characters in <c>characterArray</c>.
trans-unit.target: O valor <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties" /> a ser usado para os caracteres em <c>characterArray</c>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextCharacters" /> class using a specified character array.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextCharacters" /> usando uma matriz de caracteres especificada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the text characters.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.String" /> que contém os caracteres de texto.

trans-unit.source: The offset to the first character to use in <c>characterString</c>.
trans-unit.target: O deslocamento para o primeiro caractere a ser usado em <c>characterString</c>.

trans-unit.source: The length of the characters to use in <c>characterString</c>.
trans-unit.target: O comprimento dos caracteres a serem usados em <c>characterString</c>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties" /> value to use for the characters in <c>characterString</c>.
trans-unit.target: O valor <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties" /> a ser usado para os caracteres em <c>characterString</c>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextCharacters" /> class using a specified character substring.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextCharacters" /> usando uma subcadeia de caracteres especificada.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextCharacters" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference" /> para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextCharacters" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference" /> that represents the text characters.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterBufferReference" /> que representa os caracteres de texto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the length of the text characters.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o comprimento dos caracteres de texto.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> object that represents the length of the text characters.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> objeto que representa o comprimento de caracteres de texto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the set of properties shared by every text character.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o conjunto de propriedades compartilhadas por todos os caracteres de texto.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties" /> value that represents the properties shared by every text character.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties" /> valor que representa as propriedades compartilhadas por todos os caracteres de texto.
